Articles.Content: For those who have had success with lander legs in 1.1.3, I would like some tips. How much mass can each leg handle? Approximate spring/damper settings for lower gravity bodies (such as Mun/Minmus)? How can I mitigate the known sliding issues?

For the last part of the question, one answer is: after landing, retract some/all of the legs. Retracting the uphill leg is probably smartest.

For part 2 of the question: when 1.1.2 came out, I did some quickie testing and put some weight limits in the wiki articles for each leg.
